results.text: These have come so that the proven genuineness of your faith—of greater worth than gold, which perishes even though refined by fire—may result in praise, glory and honor when Jesus Christ is revealed.
results.reflection: Through tests and trials, our faith is refined and strengthened, bringing glory to God.

results.text: because you know that the testing of your faith produces perseverance.
results.reflection: Tests in our faith are opportunities for growth and building endurance.

results.text: The crucible for silver and the furnace for gold, but the Lord tests the heart.
results.reflection: God examines our hearts to refine and purify us for His purposes.

results.text: Test me, Lord, and try me, examine my heart and my mind;
results.reflection: Asking God to search our hearts and minds leads to growth and transformation.

results.text: their work will be shown for what it is, because the Day will bring it to light. It will be revealed with fire, and the fire will test the quality of each person’s work.
results.reflection: Our actions and deeds will be tested by fire, revealing the true quality of our work.
